name: Blago
description:
Blago is a 2D platformer created in 3 months 

with a team of 5 people during my studies at Pôle 3D.

This game takes place in caves where dozens of miners descend in search of wealth, so you will have to brave all dangers in order to achieve it!

Team : 

Romain Dubar: Game Designer / Level Designer / Director 

Etienne Javelle:  Gameplay Programming / Tool Dev

Nicolas Decouture: Environment artist

Sonia Moktefi: Character Artist / Environment artist / Fx Artist 

Félix Coeugniet: Environment artist / Artistic Director /Sound Designer
